description:
Nicktoons MLB 3D goes yard with 27 top Nicktoons, 175 MLB® players and updated rosters, new Nicktoons Jimmy Neutron and Hiro Mightypaw, new ballparks and gameplay modes! Utilize DS Local Play for head-to-head 3D action! It’s an epic 3D baseball showdown as the animated All-Stars challenge top players from all 30 MLB® clubs.

• Step up to the plate with 27 Nicktoons characters including SpongeBob SquarePants, ZIM, Ren Hoek, Katara, Danny Phantom, Patrick Star, GAZ, Dudley Puppy, Aang, Stimpy, Kitty Katswell and more!
• 175 MLB® players with updated rosters – even the brand new Miami Marlins uniform.
• New baseball experience – Flyballs and fastballs leap off the screen with enhanced 3D graphics.
• Utilize DS wireless capabilities for head-to-head 3D action.
name: Nicktoons MLB® 3D
